_header: I am diseased and all forshend
_description: A single couplet in a Latin homily for Good Friday

OxfBal149.Transcription:
Y am disseset & al for schendesori & sykande & alle to
                    rent
OxfBal149.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.131.

OxfMagd93.Transcription:
y am dysesyd & all for shentsory and syghand and all to
                    rent

CULKk424.Transcription:
y am desesyd & al for schendsore & syke & al to
                    rendof þys tormentes que cristus hodie pertulit
CULKk424.Note:
In a sermon (by John Bromyard?) dominica in passione vel in die
                        parasceue.

TCD277.Transcription:
I am mysseyn & all to schentsory & syghand & all to
                    rent
TCD277.Attributed Title:
Amore Langueo (scribe, p. 185); Sermo de passione Cristi in die
                        parasceues facienda (added, p. 185)
